remarks: The partial isomorphism A for a lattice ` K ` is a one-to-one, onto function.  Part of Lemma M of [Crawley] p. 121 line 12, with closed subspaces rather than subspaces.  See ~ diadm for the domain. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dvadia.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvadia.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvadia.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvadia.n $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvadia.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
diaf1oN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> I : dom I -1-1-onto-> { x e. S | ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` x ) ) = x } ) $.
$d H x $.
$d I x $.
$d K x $.
$d S x $.
$d W x $.
